container.magisterium.arcane_table.only_: Only the first seven bookmarks will show
container.magisterium.arcane_table.name_: Name bookmarks to give sections a title
container.magisterium.spell_book.untitle: Rename the bookmark item to give the section a title.
magisterium.no_glyphs_found: No glyphs were found in range
magisterium.invalid_illusion_block: Cannot create illusion of this block
magisterium.failed_some_world_changes: Failed to make some changes to the world
magisterium.failed_all_world_changes: Failed to make any changes to the world
magisterium.spell.magisterium.awaken_the: Ignite nearby candles, torches and other kinds of fire bearers and receptacles.

Iɢɴɪs ᴅᴏʀᴍɪᴇɴs, ɴᴜɴᴄ sᴜʀɢᴇ!

Lᴜᴍᴇɴ ᴛɪʙɪ ɪᴍᴘᴇʀᴏ, ꜰʟᴀᴍᴍᴀᴇ ʀᴇᴠᴇʟᴇᴛᴇ!
magisterium.spell.magisterium.quench_the: Extinguish nearby candles, torches and other kinds of fire bearers and receptacles.

Iɢɴɪs ᴠɪᴠᴇɴs, ɴᴜɴᴄ ǫᴜɪᴇsᴄᴇ!

Lᴜᴍᴇɴ ᴛɪʙɪ ɴᴇɢᴀᴛᴜʀ, ꜰʟᴀᴍᴍᴀᴇ ᴇxᴛɪɴɢᴜᴇᴛᴇ!
magisterium.spell.magisterium.glyphic_ig: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: arcane glyphs placed on the ground nearby
Ignite the arcane glyphs, destroying them in the process.

Sɪɢɪʟʟᴀ ɪɢɴᴇs sᴜsᴄɪᴘɪᴛᴇ!

Rᴜᴘᴛɪs ɪɢɴɪʙᴜs ᴀᴄᴄᴇɴᴅɪᴛᴇ!
magisterium.spell.magisterium.conflagrat: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: up to three objects infused with fire element
Unleash a burst of scorching fire, setting the entire area around the caster ablaze.
Additional items drastically increase the range of spell.

Iɢɴɪs ᴅᴏᴍɪɴᴀᴛᴜʀ, ɴɪʜɪʟ ʀᴇʟɪɴǫᴜᴇ ɪɴ ᴄɪɴᴇʀɪʙᴜs!

Mᴀᴛᴇʀɪᴀ ᴀʀᴅᴇᴀᴛ, sɪᴛ ꜰʟᴀᴍᴍɪs ᴄᴏɴsᴜᴍᴘᴛᴀ!

Oᴍɴɪᴀ ᴇᴛ sɪɴɢᴜʟᴀ ɪɴꜰʟᴀᴍᴍᴀʀᴇ!
ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: up to three objects infused with cold element
Unleash a surge of biting frost, freezing the entire area around the caster.
Additional items drastically increase the range of spell.

Gᴇʟᴜᴍ ʀᴀᴘɪᴅᴜᴍ, ᴇx ᴄᴏʀᴅᴇ ᴍᴇᴏ ᴅɪꜰꜰᴜɴᴅᴇ!

Gʟᴀᴄɪᴇs ʀᴇɢɴᴇᴛ, ᴄᴀʟᴏʀ ᴀʙsᴄᴇᴅᴀᴛ!

Oᴍɴɪᴀ ᴇᴛ sɪɴɢᴜʟᴀ ɢʟᴀᴄɪᴀʀᴇ!
magisterium.spell.magisterium.illusory_w: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: material that the wall is to be made of, a line of arcane glyphs on the ground
Create a wall of illusion that seems solid, but can be passed through.

Pᴀʀɪᴇs ꜰᴀʟʟᴀx, ᴠɪᴅᴇᴀʀɪs ꜰɪʀᴍᴜs ᴇᴛ ᴀʟᴛᴜs!

Tᴀɴɢᴀɴᴛ ᴛᴇ ꜰʀᴜsᴛʀᴀ, sᴏʟɪᴅᴜᴍ ᴠɪᴅᴇʀᴇ sᴇᴅ ᴜᴍʙʀᴀ sɪs.

Vᴇʀɪᴛᴀs ᴀʙsᴄᴏɴᴅɪᴛᴀ, ᴜᴍʙʀᴀ ᴘᴇʀᴍᴀɴᴇ!
magisterium.spell.magisterium.arcane_lif: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: a three by three circle of arcane glyphs, bottle of liquid magic
Summon a rising stream of arcane energy that lifts the creatures and objects into the air.

Aʀᴄᴀɴᴜᴍ ʟᴇᴠᴀʀᴇ, ᴀᴇᴛʜᴇʀᴀ ᴛᴀɴɢᴀᴍᴜs!

Cᴏʀᴘᴏʀᴀ ᴇᴛ ᴍᴇɴs sᴜʀɢᴀɴᴛ, ɪɴ ᴀʟᴛᴜᴍ ᴇʟᴇᴠᴇɴᴛᴜʀ!
magisterium.spell.magisterium.dispel_mag: Does not undo the changes already done, nor can affect other schools of arcana.

Vɪs ᴀʀᴄᴀɴᴀ, ɪɴ ɴɪʜɪʟᴜᴍ ʀᴇᴅᴅᴇ!

Sɪᴛ ᴠᴀᴄᴜᴜᴍ ᴜʙɪ ᴀʀs ꜰᴜɪᴛ, ɴᴜɴᴄ ᴇᴠᴀɴᴇsᴄᴇ!
magisterium.spell.magisterium.magic_barr: ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴏɴᴇɴᴛs: a line of arcane glyphs on the ground, nether wart, magma cream and a bottle of liquid magic
Call into existence an impenetrable wall of arcane energy, solid even to the creator.

Pᴀʀɪᴇs ᴀʀᴄᴀɴᴀ, sᴜʀɢᴇ ᴇᴛ ᴛᴇɢɪ, ᴛᴇ ꜰɪʀᴍɪᴛᴇʀ ᴇʀɪɢᴇ!

Nᴜʟʟᴜs ᴛʀᴀɴsᴇᴀᴛ, ɴᴜʟʟᴜs ꜰʀᴀɴɢᴇʀᴇ ᴀᴜᴅᴇᴀᴛ.

Oᴍɴɪs ᴠɪʀᴇs ᴀʀᴄᴇ, ɪɴᴠɪᴄᴛᴀ ᴘᴇʀᴍᴀɴᴇ!
